product_name: Dude Girl Daisy Dude Girl Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: The women's Daisy Dude Girl Jersey from Dude Girl is made of ultra-breathable, 100% polyester to keep you feeling and looking good as you ride. 3/4-length exposed zipper at throat offers customizable venting. Modern, relaxed fit is flattering; retro-style racing stripes and bold coloring inspire speed. 3 drop-in pockets at back panel keep essentials handy. The Dude Girl Daisy Dude Girl Bike Jersey for women is made in the USA.
short_description: The women's Daisy Dude Girl Jersey from Dude Girl is made of ultra-breathable, 100% polyester to keep you feeling and looking good as you ride.
